column2: The GQP as Covid Vaccine Freeloaders projection and moral decay
column5: The Republicans are always projecting their moral rot on others. We didn’t win the election it must have been rigged.   That’s what they would do. Those people will stay on unemployment and not be productive.  That’s what they would do. All politicians are corrupt and on the take.  That’s what they would do. BLM and Antifa are violent and dangerous.  That’s what they would do. It goes on and on and leads to a you tube video by Beau of the fifth column that has a unique insight into GQP talking points about freeloaders. They are not talking about us they are talking about themselves.  Because that’s what they would do…
